verses.verse: After<WG3326> this<WG5023> there was a feast<WG1859> of the Jews;<WG2453> and Jesus<WG2424> went<WG305> up to Jerusalem.<WG2414>

Now<WG1161> there is at<WG1722> Jerusalem<WG2414> by the sheep<WG4262> market a pool,<WG2861> which<WG3588> is called<WG1951> in the Hebrew<WG1447> tongue<WG1447> Bethesda,<WG964> having<WG2192> five<WG4002> porches.<WG4745>
In these<WG5025> lay<WG2621> a great<WG4183> multitude<WG4128> of weak<WG770> folk, of blind,<WG5185> halt,<WG5560> withered,<WG3584> waiting<WG1551> for the moving<WG2796> of the water.<WG5204>

For an angel<WG32> went<WG2597> down<WG2597> at<WG2596> a certain season<WG2540> into<WG1722> the pool,<WG2861> and troubled<WG5015> the water:<WG5204> whoever<WG3588> then<WG3767> first<WG4413> after<WG3326> the troubling<WG5015> of the water<WG5204> stepped<WG1684> in was made<WG1096> whole<WG5199> of whatever<WG1221> disease<WG3553> he had.<WG2722>
And a certain<WG5100> man<WG444> was there,<WG1563> which had<WG2192> an infirmity<WG769> thirty<WG5144> and eight<WG3638> years.<WG2094>

When Jesus<WG2424> saw<WG1492> him lie,<WG2621> and knew<WG1097> that he had been<WG2192> now<WG2235> a long<WG4183> time<WG5550> in that case, he said<WG3004> to him, Will<WG2309> you be made<WG1096> whole? <WG5199>

The weak<WG770> man answered<WG611> him, Sir,<WG2962> I have<WG2192> no<WG3756> man,<WG444> when<WG3752> the water<WG5204> is troubled,<WG5015> to put<WG906> me into<WG1519> the pool:<WG2861> but while<WG1722> <WG3739> I am coming,<WG2064> another<WG243> steps<WG2597> down<WG2597> before<WG4253> me.
Jesus<WG2424> said<WG3004> to him, Rise,<WG1453> take<WG142> up your bed,<WG2895> and walk. <WG4043>
And immediately<WG2112> the man<WG444> was made<WG1096> whole,<WG5199> and took<WG142> up his bed,<WG2895> and walked:<WG4043> and on<WG1722> the same<WG1565> day<WG2250> was the sabbath.<WG4521>
The Jews<WG2453> therefore<WG3767> said<WG3004> to him that was cured,<WG2323> It is the sabbath<WG4521> day: it is not lawful<WG1832> for you to carry<WG142> your bed.<WG2895>
He answered<WG611> them, He that made<WG4160> me whole,<WG5199> the same<WG1565> said<WG2036> to me, Take<WG142> up your bed,<WG2895> and walk.<WG4043>
Then<WG3767> asked<WG2065> they him, What<WG3739> man<WG444> is that which<WG3588> said<WG2036> to you, Take<WG142> up your bed,<WG2895> and walk?<WG4043>
And he that was healed<WG2390> knew<WG1492> not who<WG5101> it was: for Jesus<WG2424> had conveyed<WG1593> himself away,<WG1593> a multitude<WG3793> being<WG5607> in that place.<WG5117>

Afterward<WG3326> <WG5023> Jesus<WG2424> finds<WG2147> him in the temple,<WG2411> and said<WG2036> to him, Behold,<WG2396> you are made<WG1096> whole:<WG5199> sin<WG264> no<WG3371> more,<WG3371> lest <WG2443> <WG3361> a worse<WG5501> thing come<WG1096> to you.
The man<WG444> departed,<WG565> and told<WG312> the Jews<WG2453> that it was Jesus,<WG2424> which<WG3588> had made<WG4160> him whole.<WG5199>

And therefore<WG1223> <WG5124> did the Jews<WG2453> persecute<WG1377> Jesus,<WG2424> and sought<WG2212> to slay<WG615> him, because<WG3754> he had done<WG4160> these<WG5023> things on<WG1722> the sabbath<WG4521> day.
But Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> them, My Father<WG3962> works<WG2038> till now, <WG2193> <WG737> and I work. <WG2038>

Therefore<WG1223> <WG5124> the Jews<WG2453> sought<WG2212> the more<WG3123> to kill<WG615> him, because<WG3754> he not only<WG3440> had broken<WG3089> the sabbath,<WG4521> but said<WG3004> also<WG2532> that God<WG2316> was his Father,<WG3962> making<WG4160> himself<WG1438> equal<WG2470> with God.<WG2316>

Then<WG3767> answered<WG611> Jesus<WG2424> and said<WG2036> to them, Truly,<WG281> truly,<WG281> I say<WG3004> to you, The Son<WG5207> can<WG1410> do<WG4160> nothing<WG3762> of himself,<WG1438> but what<WG5100> he sees<WG991> the Father<WG3962> do:<WG4160> for what<WG5100> things soever <WG3745> <WG302> he does,<WG4160> these<WG5023> also<WG2532> does<WG4160> the Son<WG5207> likewise. <WG3668>

For the Father<WG3962> loves<WG5368> the Son,<WG5207> and shows<WG1166> him all<WG3956> things that himself<WG846> does:<WG4160> and he will show<WG1166> him greater<WG3187> works<WG2041> than these,<WG5130> that you may marvel. <WG2296>
For as the Father<WG3962> raises<WG1453> up the dead,<WG3498> and vivifies <WG2227> them; even<WG2532> so<WG3779> the Son<WG5207> vivifies<WG2227> whom<WG3739> he will. <WG2309>
For the Father<WG3962> judges<WG2919> no<WG3762> man,<WG3762> but has committed<WG1325> all<WG3956> judgment<WG2920> to the Son: <WG5207>

That all <WG3956> men should honor<WG5091> the Son,<WG5207> even<WG2531> as they honor<WG5091> the Father.<WG3962> He that honors<WG5091> not the Son<WG5207> honors<WG5091> not the Father<WG3962> which<WG3588> has sent<WG3992> him.

Truly,<WG281> truly,<WG281> I say<WG3004> to you, He that hears<WG191> my word,<WG3056> and believes<WG4100> on him that sent<WG3992> me, has<WG2192> everlasting<WG166> life,<WG2222> and shall not come<WG2064> into<WG1519> condemnation;<WG2920> but is passed<WG3327> from death<WG2288> to life. <WG2222>

Truly,<WG281> truly,<WG281> I say<WG3004> to you, The hour<WG5610> is coming,<WG2064> and now<WG3568> is, when<WG3753> the dead<WG3498> shall hear<WG191> the voice<WG5456> of the Son<WG5207> of God:<WG2316> and they that hear<WG191> shall live. <WG2198>
For as the Father<WG3962> has<WG2192> life<WG2222> in himself;<WG1438> so<WG3779> has he given<WG1325> to the Son<WG5207> to have<WG2192> life<WG2222> in himself; <WG1438>
And has given<WG1325> him authority<WG1849> to execute<WG4160> judgment<WG2920> also,<WG2532> because<WG3754> he is the Son<WG5207> of man. <WG444>
Marvel<WG2296> not at this:<WG5124> for the hour<WG5610> is coming,<WG2064> in the which<WG3739> all<WG3956> that are in the graves<WG3419> shall hear<WG191> his voice, <WG5456>

And shall come<WG1607> forth;<WG1607> they that have done<WG4160> good,<WG18> to the resurrection<WG386> of life;<WG2222> and they that have done<WG4238> evil,<WG5337> to the resurrection<WG386> of damnation. <WG2920>

I can<WG1410> of my<WG1683> own self<WG1683> do<WG4160> nothing: <WG3756> <WG3762> as I hear,<WG191> I judge:<WG2919> and my judgment<WG2920> is just;<WG1342> because<WG3754> I seek<WG2212> not my<WG1699> own will,<WG2307> but the will<WG2307> of the Father<WG3962> which<WG3739> has sent<WG3992> me.
If<WG1437> I bear<WG3140> witness<WG3140> of myself,<WG1683> my witness<WG3141> is not true. <WG227>
There is another<WG243> that bears<WG3140> witness<WG3140> of me; and I know<WG1492> that the witness<WG3141> which<WG3739> he witnesses<WG3140> of me is true. <WG227>
You sent<WG649> to John,<WG2491> and he bore<WG3140> witness<WG3140> to the truth. <WG225>
But I receive<WG2983> not testimony<WG3141> from man:<WG444> but these<WG5023> things I say,<WG3004> that you might be saved. <WG4982>
He was a burning<WG2545> and a shining<WG5316> light:<WG3088> and you were willing<WG2309> for a season<WG5610> to rejoice<WG21> in his light. <WG5457>

But I have<WG2192> greater<WG3187> witness<WG3141> than that of John:<WG2491> for the works<WG2041> which<WG3739> the Father<WG3962> has given<WG1325> me to finish,<WG5048> the same<WG846> works<WG2041> that I do,<WG4160> bear<WG3140> witness<WG3140> of me, that the Father<WG3962> has sent<WG649> me.

And the Father<WG3962> himself,<WG846> which has sent<WG3992> me, has borne witness<WG3140> of me. You have neither<WG3777> heard<WG191> his voice<WG5456> at<WG4455> any<WG4455> time,<WG4455> nor<WG3777> seen<WG3708> his shape. <WG1491>
And you have<WG2192> not his word<WG3056> abiding<WG3306> in you: for whom<WG3739> he has sent,<WG649> him you believe<WG4100> not.
Search<WG2045> the scriptures;<WG1124> for in them you think<WG1380> you have<WG2192> eternal<WG166> life:<WG2222> and they are they which testify<WG3140> of me.
And you will<WG2309> not come<WG2064> to me, that you might have<WG2192> life. <WG2222>
I receive<WG2983> not honor<WG1391> from men. <WG444>
But I know<WG1097> you, that you have<WG2192> not the love<WG26> of God<WG2316> in you.
I am come<WG2064> in my Father's<WG3962> name,<WG3686> and you receive<WG2983> me not: if<WG1437> another<WG243> shall come<WG2064> in his own<WG2398> name,<WG3686> him you will receive. <WG2983>
How<WG4459> can<WG1410> you believe,<WG4100> which receive<WG2983> honor<WG1391> one<WG240> of another,<WG240> and seek<WG2212> not the honor<WG1391> that comes from God<WG2316> only? <WG3441>
Do<WG4160> not think<WG1380> that I will accuse<WG2723> you to the Father:<WG3962> there is one that accuses<WG2723> you, even Moses,<WG3475> in whom<WG3739> you trust. <WG1679>
For had you believed<WG4100> Moses,<WG3475> you would have<WG2192> believed<WG4100> me; for he wrote<WG1125> of me.
But if<WG1487> you believe<WG4100> not his writings,<WG1121> how<WG4459> shall you believe<WG4100> my words? <WG4487>
